row.process: !:INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_JAVA_PROPERTIES.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHANGE_DIRECTORY_TO_AGENT_BIN :SET &CMD# = "" :IF &UC4RB_SET_ENCODING_CMD# <> "" : SET &CMD# = ' -enc &UC4RB_SET_ENCODING_CMD#' :ENDIF :IF &UC4RB_JAVA_PROP_NAME# <> "" java -jar "&$AGENT_RESOURCES_CLIENT#java-properties-tool.jar" properties RetrieveProperty -prop "&UC4RB_JAVA_PROP_FILENAME#" -var "&UC4RB_JAVA_PROP_NAME#" "&CMD#" :ELSE java -jar "&$AGENT_RESOURCES_CLIENT#java-properties-tool.jar" properties RetrieveProperty -prop "&UC4RB_JAVA_PROP_FILENAME#" "&CMD#" :ENDIF
